WorkItem.Description:
Please see https://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/443219
Microsoft.Practices.Prism.UnityExtensions is not compatible with newly (officially) released Unity 3.0(1304.0)
Seems like Unity is signed with version 3.0.0.0.

Please note the statement of official release of Unity:
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=38788

Comments.Message:
Workarounds available for this issue in the original thread:* [Prism 4.5 and Unity 3.0](https://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/443219)

Regards,

Damian Cherubinihttp://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
